headline: Franklin Resources reports preliminary AUM of $1.61T at June 30, 2025
summary: Franklin Resources (BEN) reported preliminary month-end assets under management of $1.61T at June 30, 2025, compared to $1.57T at May 31, 2025. This month’s AUM reflected the impact of positive markets, partially offset by preliminary long-term net outflows of $1B, inclusive of $4B of long-term net outflows at Western Asset Management. Excluding Western Asset Management, preliminary long-term net inflows were $3B. For the quarter ended June 30, 2025, preliminary AUM reflected the impact of posit

headline: Franklin's June AUM Balance Rises Sequentially on Positive Markets
summary: BEN's AUM rose to $1.61T in June, up 2.1% from May, as positive markets offset $1B in net long-term outflows.
